settings.text: Join the most exclusive Speed club in sport. Applications now open! #SpeedHeroes
PitcheroGPS Player Bundle  + 1 YR Player Membership
Invitations to PitcheroGPS  Speed Meet Up
Verified Hero Status  on the PitcheroGPS Mobile App
Profile on the PitcheroGPS Speed Leaderboard!
Priority Access to PitcheroGPS  Speed Leaderboard

settings.title: 100 PLAYERS WANTED!
settings.text: PitcheroGPS are seeking 100 players to be the first in the world to join the Speed Heroes.

settings.title: Whatever sport, position or level you play, speed is undefeated and PitcheroGPS is designed to train you to go faster – every training session, every match, every time you push yourself to the limit.
settings.text:
The Speed Heroes are an exclusive group of aspiring players looking to unleash their true potential and become game changers who deliver in the moments that matter. 

We’re searching for players like you who dream of turning pro or moving up the levels – all you have to do is be prepared to showcase your speed training with PitcheroGPS and fill out the form below to be part of this incredible new talent programme.

You will be given unique early access to PitcheroGPS, free stash and invited to attend elite speed training sessions held across the UK during Summer 2023.

settings.title: In order to join the Speed Heroes programme, we want you to share our passion for speed as a game changer for players and be excited to learn, improve and perform using PitcheroGPS. Player terms are as follows:
settings.text:
• You must be an active football, rugby or hockey player training and playing matches during the 2023/24 season.
  • Amateur or semi-professional standard playing at a club, school, college, university or academy.
  • 14 years+, all field positions and all genders
  • You must be open to sharing your passion for speed, uploading and sharing your latest speed stats after training and matches.
